text: Conduct billable telehealth visits and other billable e-services using DiyaMD's innovative technology — approved by Medicare and Medicaid.
Easily talk or video with patients — anytime, anywhere — for necessary consultations.
Increase revenue with DiyaMD by performing additional billable services, such as telehealth consultations, follow-ups, and remote patient-monitoring.
Track billing and reimbursement automatically and accurately with DiyaMD's unique technology.
